Name: Purple Flirt #2
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & cherry on stick (sail).
Review: This popular drink is more brown than purple. It tastes ok, anyway.
Nutrition: One serving of Purple Flirt #2 contains 130 calories
